com.facebook.buck.parser.cache.impl

Class ParserCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.cache.impl.ParserCache

  • public class ParserCache
extends Object
    This class implements the caching behavior for parsing build specs.

      • storeBuildFileManifest

        public void storeBuildFileManifest(Path buildFile,
                                   BuildFileManifest buildFileManifest,
                                   com.google.common.hash.HashCode weakFingerprint,
                                   com.google.common.hash.HashCode strongFingerprint)
                            throws InterruptedException,
                                   IOException
        Store a parsed entry in the cache, ignoring errors
        Parameters:
        buildFile - the BUCK file associated with the cell for which the parsing is performed
        buildFileManifest - the BuildFileManifest to store
        weakFingerprint - the weak fingerprint.
        strongFingerprint - the strong fingerprint.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        IOException

      • getBuildFileManifest

        public Optional<BuildFileManifest> getBuildFileManifest(Path buildFile,
                                                        ProjectBuildFileParser parser,
                                                        com.google.common.hash.HashCode weakFingerprint,
                                                        com.google.common.hash.HashCode strongFingerprint)
                                                 throws IOException,
                                                        InterruptedException,
                                                        BuildFileParseException
        Get build file manifest for the appropriate build file from cache, ignoring errors
        Parameters:
        buildFile - BUCK file to be parsed
        parser - Parser to retrieve meta information, like includes and globs, from build file
        weakFingerprint - the weak fingerprint.
        strongFingerprint - the strong fingerprint.
        Returns:
        BuildFileManifest if found in cache, Optional.empty() if not found.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
        BuildFileParseException
